front.title: PIM-SM Multicast Routing Security Issues and Enhancements

abstract.t: This memo describes security threats for the larger (intra-domain, or inter-domain) multicast routing infrastructures. Only Protocol Independent Multicast - Sparse Mode (PIM-SM) is analyzed, in its three main operational modes: the traditional Any Source Multicast (ASM) model, Source-Specific Multicast (SSM) model, and the ASM model enhanced by the Embedded RP group-to-RP mapping mechanism. This memo also describes enhancements to the protocol operations to mitigate these threats.
